titles.title: Promoting Permanency Through Kinship Families Act
Promoting Permanency Through Kinship Families Act

To amend parts B and E of title IV of the Social Security Act to remove barriers and encourage kinship guardianship, foster, or adoptive placements for children who cannot be safely cared for in their own homes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Promoting Permanency Through Kinship Families Act
This bill revises the requirements for states with respect to foster care and adoption assistance to promote kinship placements.
